translations: 使物化；使具体化，使客观化（objectify 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: The body is objectified thought. It is objectified Will.
sentences.translation: 这个身体是客观化的思想，客观化的意志。

sentences.sentence: The view on storage and flow movement is normally objectified in terms of costs, time, space, etc.
sentences.translation: 使储存和流量移动方面的检视通常按照成本，时间，空间，其他等等。

sentences.sentence: The roles , objectified linguistically , are an essential ingredient of the objectively available world of any society.
sentences.translation: 角色，语言学方面具体的说，是任何客观社会世界的基本要素。
